name: Sleepy Road
description:
A little game created with Arthur Pejoine (Artyu) and Romain Malka during a game jam on the theme "sleep" ! It's an Arcade game based on Crossy road.

Be careful not to fall asleep or you will fall asleep forever....

You can find a playable version  without the download right here : https://simmer.io/@M0ufTchup/sleepyroad
